/********************************************************************************************************
	Step 6.1:	Create GIT Inventory table
********************************************************************************************************/	

	IF OBJECT_ID('SupplyChain.GIT_Inventory','U') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE SupplyChain.GIT_Inventory
	SELECT		*
	INTO		SupplyChain.GIT_Inventory
	FROM		SupplyChain.InventoryQuantityAndValue
	WHERE		[Subinventory] = 'GIT'

 /********************************************************************************************************
	Step 6.2:	Create GIT purchase contract table 
********************************************************************************************************/	

	IF OBJECT_ID('SupplyChain.GIT_PurchaseContracts','U') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE SupplyChain.GIT_PurchaseContracts
	SELECT		*
	INTO		SupplyChain.GIT_PurchaseContracts
	FROM		SupplyChain.PurchaseContracts
	WHERE		[Blanket Purchase Agreement Number] IN (
															SELECT		DISTINCT COALESCE([Agreement/Sales Contract Number],[Order Number])
															FROM		SupplyChain.ShippingContracts
														)

 /********************************************************************************************************
	Step 6.3:	Create GIT sales contract table
********************************************************************************************************/	

	IF OBJECT_ID('SupplyChain.GIT_SalesContracts','U') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE SupplyChain.GIT_SalesContracts
	SELECT		*
	INTO		SupplyChain.GIT_SalesContracts
	FROM		SupplyChain.SalesContracts
	WHERE		[Sales Contract Number] IN	(
												SELECT		DISTINCT COALESCE([Agreement/Sales Contract Number],[Order Number])
												FROM		SupplyChain.ShippingContracts
											)
